name: Beanus
description:
In Beanus you play as a Bean. Your goal is to destroy all the red cubes,  defeat the final BOSS and survive. 

You will need to fight against cubes and also do parkour to finally defeat the red cubes... Good Luck Soldier :)

NEW UPDATE - Version 1.1

-Fixed the gaps threw the doors 

-Fixed the Darkness levels (everything should work fine now)

-Your bullets will no longer be stuck on invinsible walls
